name: Press
description: A page dedicated to showcasing Rito's acknowledgment by various media outlets and highlights of his achievements.

about.headline: Call of Duty: Warzone Bug Causes Riot Shields To Disappear
about.keywords: Call of Duty, Warzone, Rito Rhymes, bugs, Quality Assurance, video, rap
about.description: Rito was featured by Screen Rant for his innovative approach to addressing a longstanding Call of Duty: Warzone bug involving disappearing Riot Shields. By combining spoken-word rap with gameplay footage, Rito Rhymes drew attention to this issue, assisting players in navigating the glitch until a fix is implemented.

isBasedOn.name: Warzone Vanishing Rito Shield Bug (Rap)
isBasedOn.description: Rito Rhymes raps about a bug plaguing a certain weapon class in Call of Duty Warzone and demonstrates it with footage as quality assurance infotainment.
